name: Dragon's Sin
description: A medieval-style fantasy action game themed around dragons. You will know a story about a handsome mercenary, Greer, who is a child of the Dragon Lord. Use his ability to kill many Dark-Dragons.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win7 / Win8 / Win10 Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Phenom II X3 more Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7950 more DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 8 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Win7 / Win8 / Win10 Processor: Intel Core i7 more Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon HD 7970 more DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 8 GB available space
